resources.string: Already Registered? Please Sign In Here
Food Rescue is a program where we bring people together that are passionate about reducing food waste in Singapore. We re-distribute unwanted food to whoever that is willing to consume it.
Steps on how to join the program:
1. Fill up the form given in this app
2. Wait for the confirmation reply via Whatsapp, it can take up to 2 to 3 working days
3. If successful, you will be added to a group chat else you will be added to another group chat (waiting list) due to high demand
